jobs.title: Business Development Intern
jobs.description:
Business Development Intern

Zinc’s looking for a Business Development intern that has an appetite to learn. This is a paid internship that will be demanding learning experience working in a fast-paced startup. This is a generalist business development role that is an opportunity for someone who would like to gain experience in a B2B business development role.

Zinc offers Autonomy a chance to influence and impact an industry changing product. Work hands-on across a wide set of areas of business development; warm account development, customer success, written outreach, event networking, market analysis. 

Who Are Zinc?

Zinc offers blockchain backed employee background checking tools. We’re building hiring tools for the next generation of the web. Our tools allow companies to become more efficient at hiring and create unforgettable candidate journeys, by gifting candidates with ownership over their interview data.

Zinc makes hiring the right people faster and fairer, with automated referencing, feedback and background checking tools. Founded in 2017 Zinc is an early stage startup with a small team of 5. Zinc offers an opportunity to within a tight-knit startup team that is motivated to get their best work from each other. 

Your Day To Day:

~ Develop new outbound campaigns from scratch; from idea, mapping, execution to close.
~ Learn the Zinc customer journey; identify with and incorporate our tone in your campaigns.
~ A chance to assess internal sales process, suggest and implement new ideas.
~ Work directly with the CEO, a chance to shadow and learn about modern B2B techniques.
~ Plan and conduct research with current customers and test new markets.
~ Some aspects of customer success to understand our target audience and the content that speaks to them.
~ Take an active role in promoting and communicating Zinc’s values and mission.

Your DNA: 

~ Ability to actively listen and read social situations.
~ Enrolled in a credible undergraduate or graduate program.
~ Empathy and awareness to understand customer needs and spot opportunities.
~ Ability to write short-form outreach content and a sharp ear for picking up Zinc’s brand identity.
~ Has worked in a professional environment and or understands how startups operate.
~ High-energy self-starter that’s able to take the initiative
~ Thrives in a fast-paced, challenging, and dynamic environment
~ High emotional intelligence, understands how to give and receive honest feedback.

Apply if you’re curious to find out more.

jobs.title: Customer Success Intern - South London
jobs.description:
Customer Success Intern - South London

Zinc’s looking for a Customer Success intern that has an appetite to learn. This is a paid internship that will be demanding learning experience working in a fast-paced startup. This role will be working with new and existing customers to deliver unforgettable experiences. This is an opportunity for someone who would like to gain experience in a startup environment and gain an understanding of Customer success, BD and marketing.

Zinc offers a chance to influence and impact an industry-changing product. Work hands-on across a wide set of areas; customer coaching, account development, customer success, written and phone-based success work.

Who Are Zinc?

Zinc offers blockchain backed employee background checking tools. We’re building hiring tools for the next generation of the web. Our tools allow companies to become more efficient at hiring and create unforgettable candidate journeys, by gifting candidates with ownership over their checking data.

Zinc makes hiring the right people faster and fairer, with automated referencing, feedback and background checking tools. Founded in 2017 Zinc is an early stage startup with a small team of 5. Zinc offers an opportunity to within a tight-knit startup team that is motivated to get their best work from each other. 

Your Day To Day:

~ Able to be passionate about helping our customers hire and empowering people with data.
~ Learn the Zinc customer journey; identify with and incorporate our tone in your comms.
~ A chance to assess internal success process, suggest and implement new ideas.
~ Work directly with the CEO, a chance to shadow and learn about modern B2B techniques.
~ Plan and conduct research with current customers and run customer success campaigns
~ Some aspects of customer success to understand our target audience and the content that speaks to them.
~ Take an active role in promoting and communicating Zinc’s values and mission.

Your DNA: 

~ Ability to actively listen and read social situations.
~ Enrolled in a credible undergraduate or graduate program.
~ Empathy and awareness to understand customer needs.
~ Excellent short-form written communication.
~ High-energy self-starter that’s able to take the initiative
~ Thrives in a fast-paced, challenging, and dynamic environment
~ High emotional intelligence, understands how to give and receive honest feedback.

Apply if you’re curious to find out more.
